rules.title: Voting Rules
rules.subtitle: Please read carefully before voting.
items: Each person can vote for up to 1 performance.
Votes are only valid while the voting gate is open.
Submitted choices cannot be changed or canceled.
Results are automatically aggregated by total votes.
